version_description:
- Compatible with iPhone 5 (4 inches retina)
- Add new module: SHB Promotion
(menu: "Thông tin khuyến mại" in Form Login)
Update for fix bug

- Sửa lỗi hiển thị trên iOS 8 và phiên bản sau.
- Fix display issues in iOS 8 and above.

- Fix some GUI bugs.
- Stability Improvement.

- New function : SHB Qpay with Qr code.
- Improvement of UI/UX.
- New theme, new icon.
- Added customisation of user Profile Picture.
- Add new feature : Update Notification.

version_name: 3.0IT’S OUR BIGGEST UPDATE EVERCompletely changing interface. Adding new function. Now

version_description: - Add new feature : Instant transfer 24/7 by account number.

version_name: 3.0IT’S OUR BIGGEST UPDATE EVERCompletely changing interface. Adding new function. Now

version_description:
What's New in SHB Mobile Version 3.0
IT’S OUR BIGGEST UPDATE EVER
Completely changing interface. Adding new function. Now, you could open and close term deposits account on your mobile phone.

SEE EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
You can see all your finances at a glance: account balance, credit card statement and more.

PAY YOUR BILL WITH 2 TAPS
SHB Mobile remembers your bill information after the first time, so you just have to confirm.

FAST AND CONVENIENT TRANSFER
SHB Mobile remembers your beneficiary information after the first time. Besides, you could enjoy instant interbank transfer, through both card and account number.

SEARCH EASILY EVER
SHB Mobile suggest results base on what you type. Besides, you could choose options of time range to search transactions: today, 5 last transactions, this week, month or optional time range.
